snippet.title: Gardens of Babylon - Walkabout Mini Golf - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The Hanging Gardens of Babylon are now open! This is the first add-on course available for purchase (USD $2.99) and includes all the usual lost balls, night (hard) mode, foxhunt and special putter. But the release also includes several major improvements to the base game:
Player Profiles: There are now 6 save slots for people sharing a headset
Localization: We now support English, French, Spanish, German, Japanese and Korean.
Oculus Invite/Group Join/Presence
https://www.mightycoconut.com/minigolf
